H3.text: what team did adrian peterson play for in college. University of Oklahoma

A4.text: He played college football for the Oklahoma Sooners, setting the freshman rushing record with 1,925 yards in 2004.

A5.text: Peterson attended the University of Oklahoma, where he played for the Oklahoma Sooners football team from 2004 to 2006 under head coach Bob Stoops.
